Text: I love this educational/documentary material. I have been registered at mvgroup site for a few of years already. Just curious if anyone knows of any other similar educational/documentary sites or uploaders
I'm still looking - I'll have a word with a French guy I know at work - there could be a French or German site.
Thanks Basil, I have looked around the internet but nothing comes close to mvgroup. I guess they are the best in their class.
